robot_capabilities.differential_drive_robot_with_carrier: It can inspect things carefully. Carries bulk farming supplies like water, seeds, fertilizer, or harvested crops. Moves on flat soil paths. Equipped with GPS and a large payload compartment. Cannot manipulate objects but can follow routes to support other robots.
robot_capabilities.differential_drive_robot_with_arm: It can fix thing carefully. Performs precision tasks like planting, spraying, cutting grass, and weeding. Equipped with robotic arm, GPS, depth camera, and sensors. Can manipulate objects, place items into soil, or remove unwanted plants. CAn seed planting, localized spraying, and weed removal. can remove diseased plants or weeds if detected using visual or thermal sensors.
robot_capabilities.robot_dog_with_arm: It can carry the items to fix things. Capable of inspecting uneven terrain, reaching sloped crop areas, and assisting animals in the field. Equipped with GPS, thermal sensor, depth camera, and a robotic arm. Can assist with crop health checks, retrieve dropped tools, or help herd animals. can remove diseased plants or weeds if detected using visual or thermal sensors.

robot_morphology.differential_drive_robot_with_carrier: Payload: ~20 kg, Speed: 0–2 m/s, Weight: 55 kg, Size: 950 x 550 x 550 mm, Carrier Bin: ~30 L
robot_morphology.differential_drive_robot_with_arm: Payload: ~10 kg, Speed: 0–1.5 m/s, Weight: 50 kg, Size: 850 x 500 x 550 mm, Arm Reach: ~0.8 m
robot_morphology.robot_dog_with_arm: Payload: ~8 kg, Speed: 0–2.5 m/s, Weight: 42 kg, Size: 1000 x 500 x 500 mm, Arm Reach: ~0.6 m, Terrain: Soil paths, field edges, rocky patches

task_specific_rules: If a location is unreachable by wheeled robots, the robot dog should take over the inspection or task.
If robot arm needs refilling (seeds or spray), it should request the carrier robot to assist.
If animal presence is detected in the field, robot dog should inspect and gently guide them away.
If tool or object is dropped, robot dog with arm can retrieve and return it to the correct robot.
Only arm-equipped robots may manipulate field objects like soil patches or seed trays.
Carrier robot can move to refilling stations when empty, then return to active robots.
to trasnsport the grass, it need to be cut first, then the arm robot can pick it up and place it in the carrier
For precise row alignment, the arm robot should use GPS with visual landmarks for correction.
differential_drive_robot_with_arm can repair fences when provided with the necessary tools and materials.
differential_drive_robot_with_carrier should transport fencing tools and materials to the arm robot for fence repair.
Inspect the field for dry or drained crop areas and activate the appropriate water pump to irrigate them.
task_replanning_rules: If any robot is blocked by an obstacle, reroute the nearest robot with terrain compatibility.
If carrier is empty, refill and return automatically without interrupting other robots.
If crop health status is degraded, switch the robot dog to monitoring mode and alert the arm robot to assist.
If arm malfunction is detected during planting, pause task and request dog robot to provide assistance or notify human.
